message.record: 无法完成传输。|Can't complete the transfer.
升级失败:无回应。|Upgrade failure: no response.
升级失败:无法发送初始数据包。|Can't send the initial packet.
发送数据包异常，请检测串口！|Send abnormal data packet, please detect the serial port!
请选择升级文件！|Please select the upgrade file!
连接超时，请重试！|Connection timeout, please try again!
请给模块重新上电！|Please re-energize the module!
下发指令失败，请检测串口。|Failed to issue instructions, please detect the serial port.
发送重启指令。。。|Send a restart command...
打开串口失败，检测是否占用。|Failed to open serial port to detect occupancy.
请选择文件|Please select the file
